channel.title: OrgXtract on IMI Showtime
channel.description: Recent content in OrgXtract on IMI Showtime

item.title: Process
item.description: Defining our Problem To understand the problem better, we took a deep dive into the composition of organizational charts of German authorities. Every organizational chart not only looked different but also did not follow the same structure. The only thing they had in common was their format: PDF. We had a lot of discussion with the Open Knowledge Foundation about their objective to make these organizational charts machine-readable. Their answer was straightforward: To make research easier and, above all, faster.
